crmPack 0.2.8
  • Reference

Class for the mDA-CRM data input

DataDA-class.Rd

This is a subclass of Data, so contains all slots from Data, and in addition DLT free survival values. (Note that “survival” values here refers to the time that the subject did not experience any DLT yet, and is not referring to deaths.)

Slots

u

the continuous vector of DLT free survival values

npiece

the number of pieces in the PEM DSB: todo: can npiece go to the model slots?

Tmax

the DLT observation period

t0

time of initial dosing for each patient

Examples

data <- DataDA(x=c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, 10, 10, 10),
              y=c(0, 0, 1, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0),
              doseGrid=
                c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6,
                  seq(from=10, to=80, by=2)),
              u=c(42,30,15,5,20,25,30,60),
              t0=c(0,-15,-30,-40,-55,-70,-75,-85),
              Tmax=60,
              npiece=10)
#> Error in DataDA(x = c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, 10, 10, 10), y = c(0, 0, 1,     1, 0, 0, 1, 0), doseGrid = c(0.1, 0.5, 1.5, 3, 6, seq(from = 10,     to = 80, by = 2)), u = c(42, 30, 15, 5, 20, 25, 30, 60),     t0 = c(0, -15, -30, -40, -55, -70, -75, -85), Tmax = 60,     npiece = 10): could not find function "DataDA"

#set up an empty data set;

emptydata <- DataDA(doseGrid=c(0.1, 0.5,1, 1.5, 3, 6,
                               seq(from=10, to=80, by=2)),Tmax=60,npiece=10)
#> Error in DataDA(doseGrid = c(0.1, 0.5, 1, 1.5, 3, 6, seq(from = 10, to = 80,     by = 2)), Tmax = 60, npiece = 10): could not find function "DataDA"
